data.oai_dc:dc: This file provides documentationfor file 96boht03.dat, a comma delimited file. The data filecontains bromide concentrations within the hyporheic zone ofKuparuk River July 26, 1996, as a result of a continuos additionof the conservative tracer, sodium bromide, to the channel at anupstream site. Additionally, the concentration of one or more ofthe following, associated with a given hyporheic well but notnecessarily on the exact same date, exists within the file,phosphate, nitrate, ammonium, dissolved oxygen, specificconductivity, methane, and carbon dioxide.
